title: Relocate load address of main module IDA
content: is it possible when performing static analysis with IDA to change the default load address of the module (ie 0x00400000 in most cases depending on PE preferences) ? I think I read a book on IDA 1 year ago which taught me how to, however with googling around and browsing in IDA i didn't find anything.

answers_data.content:
Passing confirmed answer from the comment:

See Edit-->Segments-->Rebase program menu item in Ida. Online help on this menu item is here.
